mapper.insert: insert into tbl_mboard (mwriter, mtitle, mcontent) values (#{mwriter}, #{mtitle}, #{mcontent})
mapper.select: select seqno, mwriter, mtitle, to_char(mregDate,'YYY-MM-DD') as mregDate from tbl_mboard order by mregDate desc
SELECT seqno, mwriter, mtitle, to_char(mregDate,'YYY-MM-DD') as mregDate ,mcontent FROM tbl_mboard WHERE seqno=#{seqno}
